article.title: NAVMAR Continues Ground Surveillance Support in Afghanistan
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: NAVMAR Applied Sciences Corporation, Warminster, Pennsylvania, is being awarded a $7,754,429 modification to a previously awarded cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for continued support of Persistent Ground Surveillance System personnel at Forward Operating Bases throughout Afghanistan.Â The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Lakehurst, New Jersey is the contracting activity.
